title: Samsung starts development of possible OLED panel for 2024 iPad models
content:
A new report shows Samsung Display just started the development of a new OLED panel that uses a two-stack tandem structure, which could be featured on future iPad models, as rumors about an OLED iPad keeps ramping up.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung starts development of possible OLED panel for 2024 iPad models appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new report shows Samsung Display just started the development of a new OLED panel that could be featured on future iPad models.
